pages.text: The Aura Ringer can be activated by right clicking it with an Allurite Block.$(br2)When activated it emits aura particles in dark areas within a radius of 10 and grants the 'illusive' effect.
The illusive effect is received when near an activated Aura Ringer.$(br2)-It obfuscates the player ui.$(br2)-Villagers affected by it will be lured to the block.
